actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to reimburse essential access home health providers for the reasonable costs of providing home health services in rural areas.
short_title: Restoring Essential Access to Care in the Home (REACH) Act of 2000

summary.text: Restoring Essential Access to Care in the Home (REACH) Act of 2000 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to provide for reimbursement for home health services furnished by essential access home health providers, exempting such services from specified home health interim and prospective payment systems.

titles.title: Restoring Essential Access to Care in the Home (REACH) Act of 2000
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to reimburse essential access home health providers for the reasonable costs of providing home health services in rural areas.
